original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel and say to them, These are the appointed feasts of the Lord that you shall proclaim as holy convocations; they are my appointed feasts.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 이것이 나의 절기들이니 너희가 성회로 공포할 여호와의 절기들이니라

sentences.original_text: Speak to the people of Israel
These are the appointed feasts of the Lord
that you shall proclaim as holy convocations;
